definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good/eliminate vice and exalt virtue
the world in chaos/troubled times/the mortal world (Buddhism)
gonorrhea (TCM term)/more commonly known as 淋病[lin4 bing4]
lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good/eliminate vice and exalt virtue
variant of 混濁|混浊[hun4 zhuo2]

sentences.english: Junruo concubine Yang road dust, if the turbidity cement, floating and sinking of different potential, when harmonic meet?
sentences.chinese: 君若揚路塵，妾若濁水泥，浮沈各異勢，會合何時諧？

sentences.english: The lucid Yang ascends to form the heaven while the turbid Yin descends to constitute the earth.
sentences.chinese: 所以如上分析，“清陽爲天，濁陰爲地”可翻譯如下。

sentences.english: With block copolyether's forming, the cloud point lowers appreciably.
sentences.chinese: 形成嵌段使聚醚濁點明顯下降。

sentences.english: Everyone is filthy whereas I am pure, everyone is drunk whereas I am sober.
sentences.chinese: 舉世皆濁我獨清，衆人皆醉我獨醒。

sentences.english: Thus, my dream is also scented with the sweet fragrance during the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 於是，一晚的濁夢便也沾上了點點溫馨的花香。

sentences.english: Shao Changrong, the famous expert of TCM, can use triple warmer separating therapy to treat turbid phlegm cough.
sentences.chinese: 名中醫邵長榮教授應用三焦辨證法治療痰濁咳嗽。

sentences.english: The clarity of the beef broth is the way to check if the beef noodles are authentic.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉湯的清與濁是檢驗牛肉麪是否正宗的祕籍之一。

sentences.english: The ore forming rock series should be turbidite origin.
sentences.chinese: 與成礦關係密切的岩石爲濁積岩成因。

sentences.english: Pulmonary complications were mainly due to accumulation of phlegm in the lung.
sentences.chinese: 出現肺部併發症多辨爲痰濁壅肺。

sentences.english: Flames flickered in the morning mist, and black smoke was slowly expanding in the opaque fog.
sentences.chinese: 火焰在晨霧中閃爍着，黑煙還慢慢地在濁霧中擴散。

sentences.english: The great Vistula rolled its yellowish, sombre vastness around low sandy islands.
sentences.chinese: 維斯瓦河奔騰向前，黃濁陰沉的巨流繞過低平的沙洲。

definition: hole/opening/orifice (of the human body)/(fig.) key (to the solution of a problem)
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative
